name: Zac Zac adventure
description:
Long ago there was a great warrior called "The Great Flash" he was a protector of the planet UVE, now hundreds of years later, the world has changed and it is time for new heroes to arise to protect UVE.
Get ready to explore a new world accompanied by Zac Lime, a little fox who has a great story to tell with you, your decisions can alter the story if you are careful ... oh no.
In this game you can use weapons as simple as a small rock, even a sword, or why not a huge rock to flatten whoever bothers you.
Despite being an adventure game it is not linear, you can do several things.
+ how to travel to unexplored areas
+ collect items
+ level up by fighting
+ help villagers or small towns
every time you fight and defeat an enemy you will gain experience, the experience will allow you to level up and give you improvements in your statistics but be careful in this world danger and death abound to think twice before facing something that you you may regret.
I hope you enjoy it, and that my characters reach your heart!
